hero.name: Lucas Gros.

hero.description: I'm a product manager specialized in creating bold solutions that drive business impact. Currently focused on AI implementation and transformation at Motork, where our vehicle management app achieved 10x revenue growth YoY.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I thrive when facing unexpected challenges and venturing into uncharted territory. My engineering background combined with product management expertise allows me to bridge technical possibilities with business outcomes.

My approach centers on creating new capabilities rather than just optimizing existing ones. I craft POCs to reduce risks and sell ideas, break down complex problems into smaller milestones, and build bridges between stakeholders to drive execution from inception to delivery.
With experience across 7 European markets and versatility from ideation to maintenance, I've consistently delivered results that matter:
skills: Transforming ideas into tangible products through rapid prototyping
Building connections between technical teams and business stakeholders
Using data to inform decisions and demonstrate product vision
Managing roadmaps for teams responsible for significant revenue
about.closing: When I'm not building products, I enjoy sailing - perhaps why I naturally gravitate toward navigating complexity and finding paths through uncertain waters.
